text: Prospero Grech (24 December 1925 - 30 December 2019) was a Maltese Augustinian friar. He co-founded the Patristic Institute Augustinianum in Rome and was made a cardinal on 18 February 2012 by Benedict XVI. He was born in Birgu, Malta. Grech died on 30 December 2019 at the age of 94.Cardinal Prospero Grech dies ==References== Category:1925 births Category:2019 deaths Category:Cardinals of the Roman Catholic Church Category:Maltese people
title: Prosper Grech
